Title: Kangal Malsat
Actors: Kamalika Banerjee, Dibyendu Bhattacharya, Joyraj Bhattacharya, Kaushik Ganguly
Plot: Fyataroo: Flying human beings; Choktor: Black Magic sect Bhodi, the head of the Choktors, initiates a total war against the ruling communists of West Bengal, India. Fyataroos join hands ...
